00036 //----------------------------------------------------------
00037 GrKFAnimMgr::~GrKFAnimMgr()
00038 {
00039         AnimMap::iterator iter = _animMap.begin();
00040         const AnimMap::iterator end = _animMap.end();
00041         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00042                 delete iter->second;
00043 
00044         gGrKFAnimMgr = 0;
00045 }

00052 //----------------------------------------------------------
00053 GrKFAnim*
00054 GrKFAnimMgr::GetKFAnim( const UPath& name )
00055 {
00056         UPath fileName = name.GetPathString() + ".kfa";
00057 
00060         AnimMap::iterator iter = _animMap.find( fileName );
00061         if ( iter != _animMap.end() )
00062                 return ( GrKFAnim* )iter->second->Clone();
00063 
00065         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( fileName, RFileMgr::kFlagRead );
00066         if ( !file )
00067                 return 0;
00068 
00070         const void* fileBuffer = file->GetData();
00071         unsigned long fileSize = ( unsigned long )file->GetSize();
00072 
00074         UReader reader( fileBuffer, fileSize, false );
00075 
00078         GrKFAnim* newKFAnim = new GrKFAnim( reader );
00079         _animMap[ fileName ] = newKFAnim;
00080 
00082         file->Purge();
00083 
00085         return ( GrKFAnim* )newKFAnim->Clone();
00086 }
00087 
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------
00089 void
00090 GrKFAnimMgr::SaveKFAnim( GrKFAnim* anim )
00091 {
00092         B_ASSERT( anim != 0 );
00093 
00094         UPath fileName = anim->GetName() + ".kfa";
00095 
00098         AnimMap::iterator iter = _animMap.find( fileName );
00099         if ( iter != _animMap.end() )
00100         {
00101                 delete iter->second;
00102                 iter->second = ( GrKFAnim* )anim->Clone();
00103         }
00104         else
00105                 _animMap[ fileName ] = ( GrKFAnim* )anim->Clone();
00106 
00108         UWriter writer;
00109         anim->Save( writer );
00110 
00112         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( fileName, RFileMgr::kFlagWrite );
00113         file->WriteData( 0, writer.GetBufferPtr(), writer.GetBytesWritten() );
00114 }
